title: Blaze: crunching data in different formats through a single API
description:
Blaze allows you to use a pandas/numpy like interface to query your
data, whether it be in CSV format, SQL database, noSQL database.

Odo allows you to easily migrate your data between most formats, be it
JSON, SQL database, CSV, python data structures with just a few lines of
code.

Come learn about these exciting new parts of the python data ecosystem.
Learn how to crunch your data, and not necessarily have to learn SQL or
mongodb to do so.
